Reviews.Content: pay arrived hk 2 am cheap accessible spend remainder night wait check hotel 12 noon chose closest cosmo hotel mongkok enter hotel restaurant white french windows doors restaurant there’s manager’s don’t reception anyway receptionist confirmed booking keys remote control adaptor aircon remote control compared accommodations reviews read expecting clean cozy admit bit disappointed bed bathroom clean white walls dirty luggage scratches marks dirty fingerprints double bed 1 ½ aisle chair bathroom clean tiny stretch hand sideways you’re showering sink toilet bowl closely placed liked hardness bed pillows fine comforter clean bathroom funky smell maybe due space lack ventilation pretty decent sink bowl white clean water pressure temperature redeeming factors aircon provided temperature tv weren’t able remote control broken looking sleep tight budget bridal tea house okay bit westerners hard time moving
